metadata.title: CVE-2021-45960 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.3, a left shift by 29 (or more) placesin the storeAtts function in xmlparse.c can lead to realloc misbehavior(e.g., allocating too few bytes, or only freeing memory).

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
